name: Blooms Beyond the Atmosphere
description: A first person creative game where you collect unique flowers on a small green planet. Collected flowers can be sold to purchase decorations, or can be bred to create entirely new flowers. With fun decorations and a breeding system that can create billions of unique flowers - you'll be able to craft a planet that you can call home. And now with the new update, you'll be able to visit nearby planets and explore the strange flowers that grow throughout the alien galaxy!
